data.name: DocumentZoomType
desc: These constants specify how the document content is zoomed into the document view.

items.name: OPTIMAL
lines: The page content width (excluding margins) at the current selection is fit into the view.

items.name: PAGE_WIDTH
lines: The page width at the current selection is fit into the view.

items.name: ENTIRE_PAGE
lines: A complete page of the document is fit into the view.

items.name: BY_VALUE
lines: The zoom is relative and is to be set via the property ViewSettings.ZoomValue.

items.name: PAGE_WIDTH_EXACT
lines: The page width at the current selection is fit into the view, with the view ends exactly at the end of the page.
